snippet: The Metropolitan Museum's Costume Institute previewed parts of its highly-anticipated exhibit Monday honoring Comme des Garcons designer Rei Kawakubo during Paris Fashion Week....

headline.main: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption
headline.print_headline: Former Nigerian Governor Jailed for Five Years for Corruption

lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Museum's Costume Institute previewed parts of its highly-anticipated exhibit Monday honoring Comme des Garcons designer Rei Kawakubo during Paris Fashion Week.
